text: qal laha almalak: hkdha al'amr kama tsfyn min 'anah lm yamsask bshr, walam tkwny baghiana, wlkn rabik qal: al'amr ely shl; waliakun hdha alghulam elamt lilnaas tadulu ealaa qudrat allah teala, warahmatan mnna bih wbwaldth wbalnas, wakan wujud eisaa ealaa hadhih alhalat qada' sabqana mqddarana, mstwrana fi allwh almhfwz, fla bd min nfwdhh
